services.name: Web Development
services.shortDescription: Professional web development services using cutting-edge technologies to create fast, secure, and user-friendly websites.
services.longDescription: Our expert web development team specializes in creating custom websites, web applications, and digital platforms that drive business growth. From responsive design to complex backend systems, we deliver solutions that meet your unique requirements.

subServices.name: Static Website Design
subServices.description: Fast, lightweight static sites built with HTML/CSS and optimized for speed

subServices.name: Dynamic Website Design
subServices.description: Interactive websites driven by server-side logic and databases

subServices.name: E-Commerce Website Design
subServices.description: Complete online stores with payment gateways and inventory management

subServices.name: Blog / Magazine Website Design
subServices.description: Content-first platforms optimized for articles, categories and SEO

subServices.name: Corporate / Business Website Design
subServices.description: Professional websites tailored for companies, services and lead generation

subServices.name: Portfolio / Creative Website Design
subServices.description: Visually-driven portfolio sites for artists, photographers and creatives

subServices.name: Landing Page Design
subServices.description: High-converting single-page layouts for campaigns and product launches

subServices.name: Educational / Institutional Website Design
subServices.description: Sites for schools, colleges and institutions with course and admissions support

subServices.name: Personal / Resume Website Design
subServices.description: Simple personal websites and online resumes to showcase achievements

subServices.name: Non-Profit / Community Website Design
subServices.description: Websites for NGOs, charities and community groups with donation and event features

subServices.name: Website Redesigning
subServices.description: Modernize existing websites with improved UX and performance

services.name: Video Editing
services.shortDescription: High-quality video editing services for corporate videos, promotional content, social media, and YouTube channels.
services.longDescription: Transform your raw footage into compelling visual stories with our professional video editing services. We handle everything from color grading to motion graphics, delivering broadcast-quality videos that engage your audience.

subServices.name: Cinematic / Film-Style Editing
subServices.description: Narrative-driven editing with pacing, transitions and color grading for a cinematic look.

subServices.name: Corporate / Commercial Editing
subServices.description: Brand films, commercials and corporate video editing for professional presentations.

subServices.name: Social Media Short-Form Editing (Reels, Shorts, TikTok)
subServices.description: Vertical, punchy edits optimized for short-form platforms with captions and motion.

subServices.name: Music Video Editing
subServices.description: Rhythmic cutting, stylized effects and pacing tuned to musical tracks.

subServices.name: Event / Wedding Editing
subServices.description: Story-driven event and wedding highlight reels with emotion-led sequencing.

subServices.name: Documentary Editing
subServices.description: Long-form narrative assembly, interview structuring and archival footage integration.

subServices.name: Vlog / YouTube Editing
subServices.description: Vlog-friendly cuts, jump cuts, thumbnails, intros/outros and pacing for creators.

subServices.name: Promotional / Ad Editing
subServices.description: Short promotional videos and ad creatives optimized for conversions.

subServices.name: Motion Graphics & Visual Effects (VFX)
subServices.description: Title sequences, animated graphics, compositing and VFX work to enhance visuals.

subServices.name: Educational / Tutorial Video Editing
subServices.description: Clear, instructional edits with callouts, captions and step-by-step structure.

services.name: App Development
services.shortDescription: Custom mobile app development for iOS and Android with intuitive interfaces and powerful functionality.
services.longDescription: We build mobile applications that users love. Whether you need a native iOS app, Android app, or cross-platform solution, our team delivers high-performance mobile experiences that drive engagement and business growth.

subServices.name: Native App Development
subServices.description: Platform-specific native apps for iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin) optimized for performance.

subServices.name: Hybrid App Development
subServices.description: Hybrid apps built with web technologies wrapped for mobile using frameworks like Ionic or Cordova.

subServices.name: Web App Development
subServices.description: Browser-based applications with responsive UIs and progressive features for mobile and desktop.

subServices.name: Progressive Web App (PWA) Development
subServices.description: Installable, offline-capable PWAs that behave like native apps using service workers and manifests.

subServices.name: Cross-Platform App Development
subServices.description: Single-codebase solutions using React Native, Flutter or similar for both iOS and Android.

subServices.name: Enterprise App Development
subServices.description: Scalable, secure apps tailored for enterprise workflows, integrations and compliance.

subServices.name: E-Commerce App Development
subServices.description: Feature-rich mobile commerce apps with catalogs, carts, payments, and order management.

subServices.name: On-Demand Service App Development
subServices.description: Apps for gig and on-demand services with real-time tracking, booking and payments.

subServices.name: Educational / E-Learning App Development
subServices.description: Learning platforms and e-learning apps with courses, quizzes, and progress tracking.

subServices.name: Gaming App Development
subServices.description: Mobile game development including casual, hyper-casual and mid-core game experiences.

services.name: Software Development
services.shortDescription: Tailored software solutions for businesses including CRM, ERP, and custom enterprise applications.
services.longDescription: Build powerful custom software that streamlines your business operations. From CRM systems to inventory management, we develop scalable enterprise solutions that integrate seamlessly with your existing infrastructure.

subServices.name: Sales & CRM Software Development
subServices.description: Custom CRM and sales automation systems to manage leads, pipelines and customer relationships.

subServices.name: Accounting & Finance Software Development
subServices.description: Financial systems for invoicing, bookkeeping, payroll and financial reporting.

subServices.name: Inventory & Supply Chain Software Development
subServices.description: Inventory tracking, order management and supply chain optimization solutions.

subServices.name: Human Resource (HRM) Software Development
subServices.description: HRM platforms for employee records, attendance, payroll and performance management.

subServices.name: ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) Software Development
subServices.description: Integrated ERP systems to unify finance, HR, inventory, and operations for enterprises.

subServices.name: Project Management Software Development
subServices.description: Tools for project planning, task tracking, collaboration and resource allocation.

subServices.name: POS (Point of Sale) & Billing Software Development
subServices.description: Point-of-sale systems with billing, inventory sync and reporting for retail businesses.

subServices.name: Customer Support / Helpdesk Software Development
subServices.description: Ticketing systems, knowledge bases and live-chat integrations for customer support.

subServices.name: E-Commerce & Retail Software Development
subServices.description: E-commerce platforms, catalog management, payments and order fulfillment systems.

subServices.name: Healthcare / Hospital Management Software Development
subServices.description: Clinical management, patient records, appointments and billing software for healthcare providers.
